column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We came in here so that I didn't have to leave Chicago without getting the chance to try out deep dish pizza. As we were in a rush our options were not overwhelming as we had to decide on a place that was walking distance and wouldn't take too long to eat at. Seeing the high rating and number of reviews
column2: Malnati's seemed like the best bet and it ended up being a good call.
